mapper.select: select i.iot_id, m.member_id, mo.model_name, i.place_name from iot_info i, model mo, member m where m.member_id = #{member_id} and m.member_id = i.member_id and i.model_id = mo.model_id
mapper.insert: insert into iot_info(iot_id, out_whether, place_name, measure_cycle, location_x, location_y, ip, port, member_id, model_id) values(#{iot_id}, 'y', #{place_name}, 1, '100', '100', '39.127.7.68', 80, #{member_id}, #{model_id})
mapper.select: select iot_id from iot_info where iot_id = #{alias}
mapper.insert: insert into measure_data(measure_data_code, measure_value, measure_time, iot_id, matter_code) values(to_number(to_char(systimestamp,'YYMMDD')||to_char(data_code.nextval,'fm0000')), #{msd.measure_value}, systimestamp, #{msd.iot_id}, #{msd.matter_code})
mapper.select: select MD.MEASURE_VALUE as measure, to_char(MD.MEASURE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as TODAY, to_char(MD.MEASURE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as measuretime, MD.IOT_ID as iotID, MD.MATTER_CODE as CODE from MEASURE_DATA MD, IOT_INFO I, MEMBER M where M.member_id = #{member_id} and M.member_id = I.member_id and I.iot_id = MD.iot_id and to_char(MD.MEASURE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(#{date}) order by MD.MEASURE_TIME
select count(*) from iot_info i, model m where i.model_id = m.model_id and i.member_id = #{member_id} and m.model_classification = 'eud'
select i.iot_id as id, i.place_name as place, i.model_id as model from iot_info i, model m where i.model_id = m.model_id and i.member_id = #{member_id} and m.model_classification = 'eud'
select m.matter_code , m.matter_name from model mo, measure_matter_list mm, matter m where mo.model_id = mm.model_id and mm.matter_code = m.matter_code and mo.model_id = #{model}
select model_id from iot_info where iot_id = #{iot_id}

select to_char(measure_time,'hh24') time, to_number(to_char(avg(measure_value),'9999999999.9')) value from measure_data where iot_id = #{iot_id} and matter_code = #{matter_code} and to_char(measure_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') group by to_char(measure_time,'hh24') order by to_char(measure_time,'hh24')
